description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows compressed folder tampering vulnerability (CVE-2024-26185):

1. Download and apply the KB5035853 update from the official Windows Update catalog.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update resolves the vulnerability affecting Windows compressed folders that could lead to tampering.
- Ensure your system is running either Windows 11 Version 23H2 (10.0.22631.3296) or Version 22H2 (10.0.22621.3296).
- Backup important data before proceeding with the update installation.
- For manual installation, download the update package from: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853.
